sentences: Christopher Barry Wood (born 25 November 1969) is an American bassist with the jazz trio Medeski Martin & Wood and The Wood Brothers.
Wood was raised in Boulder, Colorado, where he studied jazz and classical music.
He attended the New England Conservatory of Music in 1989.
Reducing his classes, he accompanied Moses and John Medeski as sidemen for a tour, then played with them in New York City.
He formed Medeski Martin & Wood in 1991 with Medeski and Billy Martin.
